University Street West Lafayette, IN 47907 Phone: 765-494-7190 Fax: 765-494-0739 Email: lintan at purdue.edu Bio: [bio] Our USEagent/USEbench paper accpeted to ICSE 2026! Unified Software Engineering Agent as AI Software Engineer [Preprint] Our CSnake: Detecting Self-Sustaining Cascading Failure via Causal Stitching of Fault Propagations paper accpeted to EuroSys 2026! Our CoRe paper accepted to NeurIPS 2025 (Spotlight)! CoRe: Benchmarking LLMs' Code Reasoning Capabilities through Static Analysis Tasks [Preprint] Check out CoRe code and data! Two papers accepted to ACL 2025 Main Conference: Can Language Models Replace Programmers for Coding? RepoCod Says 'Not Yet'. Check out our code generation benchmark RepoCod! WAFFLE: Webpage Multi-Modal Model for Automated Front-End Development. Our paper SELP: Generating Safe and Efficient Task Plans for Robot Agents with Large Language Models is an ICRA 2025 Best Paper Award Finalist, selected from 4,153 submissions! Check our SELP demo, data, and more! Our ICLR 2025 paper Nova: Generative Language Models for Assembly Code with Hierarchical Attention and Contrastive Learning is available. We have released our foundation models for binary code and fine-tuned models for binary code recovery. We have open positions for PhD and undergraduate students! Keynote speech "Synergy of Software Reliability and Large Language Models" at ICST 2024!
